attributes.action: Ensure the government allows the proposed Surrey Police Budget and abandon it's efforts to cap the force which will see a further loss of 50 jobs in local crime prevention, Special Branch work, major crime prevention and forensic work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A petition to force the government to consider its proposal that the Surrey Police Authority should have to refund Surrey residents 6 pence a week with a cost of £1.2 million in adminstration and at least 50 vital police jobs. 

This money which the government has insisted must be be refunded would be found if the current government scrapped its pointless and heavily criticised ID card project.
